abstract: Coca-Cola is hoping its new mobile site for social networking, Sprite Yard, will become the MySpace of the cellphone world.
snippet: Coca-Cola is hoping its new mobile site for social networking, Sprite Yard, will become the MySpace of the cellphone world.
lead_paragraph: The Coca-Cola Company is hoping its new mobile site for social networking, Sprite Yard, will become the MySpace of the cellphone world.

headline.main: Promoting a Thirst for Sprite in Teenage Cellphone Users
headline.print_headline: Promoting a Thirst for Sprite In Teenage Cellphone Users
